name: WeeFarers Baby Sunglasses
description: Polarized sunglasses for babies and kids ages 0 up to 3 years old - includes a protective carrying pouch and easily adjustable strap! The iconic look, now reimagined for young eyes. Polarized lenses that reduce eye strain and minimize glare from the ultraviolet rays of the sun.
